venue.name: Center for Digital Imaging Arts at Boston University

item.description:
You have to register at the CIPNE web site for this event!!!
http://www.cipne.org/...

Bill Gallery & Michael Malyszko

Monday May 18, 2009

What does it take to prosper over the long term in the formidable New England photography market? Come find out at CIPNE’s May seminar. Thirty-year veterans Bill Gallery and Michael Malyszko will share their stories of achieving success, and making it last!

Seasoned documentary shooter Bill Gallery specializes in capturing images of the workplace unobtrusively, without lighting or crew. Clients such as Apple Computer, Herman Miller, and Coca Cola use him to create credible well composed images for annual reports, advertising, and special projects.



Michael Malyszko takes photographs that combine true documentary photography with casual and formal portraiture for corporate, educational and institutional clients such as AT&T, Blue Cross/Blue Shield, and Harvard University. Published in over 60 countries, his work has won many prestigious national and international awards.

NEW & IMPROVED LOCATION!
Center for Digital Imaging Arts
274 Moody Street
Waltham, MA 02453

Registration: 6:00–7:00pm
Program: 7:00–10:00pm

Cost: CIPNE Members, Free; Professional Association Members*, $25;
Guests, $35; Full-time Students**, FREE.

*ASMP, PPA, etc. Please bring proof of membership.
**Full-time students will be required to present their photo-IDs at registration.

Pre-registration is required for this program.
http://www.cipne.org/... (Non-members may pay by PayPal)
Please note: on-line registration closes May 15th.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Staying Power- Two Local Pros Go the Distance
